content: Yes, the live audience is an essential part of the music award show experience, as it adds to the excitement and energy of the event. However, virtual music events have allowed for more creative approaches to showcasing music and artist performances. It is possible that in the future, there will be a mix of virtual and in-person music events that cater to different types of audiences, as it puts the best of both worlds together. Still, we cannot deny that there's a particular charm that comes with live events that virtual events cannot completely recreate.
